ISSUE.TITLE: Typo in podman-build.1.md.in
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Description https://docs.podman.io/en/stable/markdown/podman-build.1.html#building-an-image-using-a-git-repository : > Podman fetches the archive file, decompress it, and use its contents as the build context. → *decompressES*, *useS* In the same file: > Podman clones the specified GitHub repository to a temporary location and use it as the context. → *useS* ### Steps to reproduce the issue Not applicable. ### Describe the results you received Not applicable. ### Describe the results you expected Not applicable. ### podman info output ```yaml Not applicable. ``` ### Podman in a container No ### Privileged Or Rootless None ### Upstream Latest Release Yes ### Additional environment details _No response_ ### Additional information _No response_
